derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Old French, pet form of the given name Robert

entry.def: A robin is a small brown bird found in Europe. The male has an orangey-red neck and breast.
A robin is a brown bird found in North America. The male has a reddish-brown breast. North American robins are larger than European ones, and are a completely different species of bird.

means.word_mean: 1. small Old World songbird with a reddish breast
2. large American thrush having a rust-red breast and abdomen
